info.title: Cisco IOS-XE - ALL RPC Operations (Combined)
info.description:
**Complete collection of all 0 RPC operations** from all IOS-XE YANG modules in a single unified view.

This consolidated specification includes operations from multiple modules:
- Core System Operations (Cisco-IOS-XE-rpc)
- Wireless Management
- Software & Configuration Management
- Security & Cryptography
- Licensing (cisco-smart-license)
- Bridge & L2 Operations (cisco-bridge-domain)
- Network Services & Protocols
- Cloud & SD-WAN
- Diagnostics & Troubleshooting
- Platform & Hardware
- CLI & Command Line

**Authentication**: All operations require HTTP Basic Authentication.

**Base URL**: `https://{device}/restconf`

**Content-Type**: `application/yang-data+json`

basicAuth.description: HTTP Basic Authentication using device credentials
